Table of Contents

Interface IRuleRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing automated business rules (Rule entities). Defines the contract for rule persistence, querying, scoping, statistics, and condition retrieval.

public interface IRuleRepository : IRepository<Rule>
Inherited Members
IRepository<Rule>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)

IRepository<Rule>.CountWhereAsync(Expression<Func<Rule, bool>>, CancellationToken)

IRepository<Rule>.DeleteAsync(Rule, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Rule>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Rule>.InsertOrUpdateAsync(Rule, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Rule>.InsertAllAsync(IEnumerable<Rule>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Rule>.UpdateAllAsync(IEnumerable<Rule>, CancellationToken)
IRepository<Rule>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This interface abstracts all data access operations related to user-defined rules in the RSS reader application. It supports rule lifecycle management (CRUD), activation filtering, scoping by feed/category, priority-based execution, match statistics, and retrieval of associated conditions for the rule engine.

Implementations must ensure: - Efficient indexed queries on frequently filtered columns (e.g., IsEnabled, Priority). - Atomicity in write operations where business rules require it. - Avoidance of full table scans in production (prefer server-side filtering).

Checks whether a rule with the specified name already exists.
